reviews.name: Eastsport 17.5" Clear Backpack
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our son whose school only allows clear backpacks these days..... They were impossible to find in stores anywhere! So I looked on Walmart's website and found them! I really didn't expect much, figured they'd tear quickly with heavy books, etc., in there, so I ordered two just in case they weren't available later when the first one did rip. But much to my surprise, they are much stronger than I expected and the vinyl is softer, not brittle so won't puncture so easily. I almost bought four to be sure he has a backpack the whole year but decided to wait until I got the first ones to see if that would be necessary, I don't think it will be. I really think one, or at least the two of them will last the whole school year. By the way, my son is 12 and in the 7th grade. So no HUGE text books yet....
reviews.title: Better and Stronger than I Expected!

reviews.name: Eastsport 17.5" Clear Backpack
reviews.reviewText: I needed a see through bag for a boy and I needed it quick. It came and was put right to use and is holding its own. My son is very rough on his backpacks and this one is not flimsy. Good choice.
reviews.title: Holds up to teenage boy.

reviews.name: Eastsport 17.5" Clear Backpack
reviews.reviewText:
I use this as a lunch bag as I work in a Maximum Security Prison.
The cold weather takes a toll on the bag. The plastic rips around the seam at the top after about 9 months. I buy a new one every year because the value is great!!!
reviews.title: SERVES THE PURPOSE

reviews.name: Eastsport 17.5" Clear Backpack
reviews.reviewText: I had 1 before and they last for about a year
reviews.title: Good deal

reviews.name: Eastsport 17.5" Clear Backpack
reviews.reviewText: I specifically needed a clear backpack for one of my classes so I was pleased when I found this one right away for such a low price. I was even happier when it arrived fairly quickly and was exactly what I needed. Unfortunately, the DAY AFTER I opened it and used it, the zipper for the smaller front pocket broke; it comes apart and won't stay closed even after I have zipped it. I only had a few pens and a pocket notebook in there so it was by no means even remotely full. There is no reason that it should have come apart that way. Other than that it works well it is just really disappointing because (even though it was cheap) I had literally only zipped it twice.
reviews.title: you get what you pay for
